t: Amazon Go is a new kind of corner store
s: Amazon Go is a new kind of store featuring the world’s most advanced shopping technology. No lines, no checkout – just grab and go! Watch the video: amazon.com/go

3 weeks ago - On February 25, 2020, Amazon opened the first Amazon Go Grocery store in Seattle's Capitol Hill neighborhood. The Go Grocery store is significantly larger than other Go stores, at 10,400 square feet (970 m2), and offers 5,000 items, including fresh produce and baked goods.

t: Amazon rebrands Amazon Go Grocery to Amazon Fresh, closes Seattle-area store near Microsoft HQ – GeekWire
s: May 18, 2021 - The Amazon Go Grocery in Redmond, Wash., is closing. (GeekWire Photo / Taylor Soper) The news: Amazon is renaming its Amazon Go Grocery brand to “Amazon Fresh” and closing its Amazon Go Grocery store in Redmond, Wash., near Microsoft’s headquarters, GeekWire has learned.

t: Amazon rebranding Amazon Go Grocery, according to report | Chain Store Age
s: December 20, 2024 - Amazon is changing the name of one of its brick-and-mortar store formats.  · Amazon is renaming its Amazon Go Grocery store brand to “Amazon Fresh,” reported GeekWire, and closing its Amazon Go Grocery store near Microsoft’s headquarters in Redmond, Wash.
